Our Story

About University Lawn Care

We started with a push mower and a few neighbours who believed in us. Today we're one of Waterloo Region's most trusted local lawn care services ‚Äî and we haven't lost that neighbourhood feel.

How We Got Started

University Lawn Care was founded in 2019 by a group of University of Waterloo students who wanted to build something real ‚Äî not just another study session side project. We started by knocking on doors in Waterloo and offering honest, hard work at fair prices.

Word spread fast. Neighbours told neighbours. Before long, we had a full client list and a crew of like-minded students who took the same pride in the work that we did. We invested in proper equipment, got fully insured, and built systems to ensure every property got the same high standard of care.

Today we service hundreds of properties across Waterloo, Kitchener, Cambridge, and Guelph. The faces change as students graduate, but the culture doesn't: show up, do great work, be honest, and take care of your customers.

Our Mission

Making Lawn Care Effortless for Every Homeowner

We believe your property should look great without you having to think about it. Our mission is to deliver reliable, professional lawn care that frees up your time and gives you a yard you're proud of ‚Äî at a price that makes sense.

What We Stand For

Our Values

Community First

We live and work in Waterloo Region. Taking care of our community's properties is something we genuinely care about.

Honest Work

No upselling, no corner-cutting, no excuses. We say what we'll do and we do what we say.

Accountability

If something isn't right, we fix it. Our satisfaction guarantee isn't just a slogan ‚Äî we back it up.

Quality Over Speed

We take the time to do every job properly. A clean edge, a sharp cut, a tidy job site ‚Äî every single time.

You Can Trust Us With Your Property

We take the trust you put in us seriously. Here's what that looks like in practice.

Fully Insured

Commercial liability insurance on every job. Proof of coverage available upon request.

Professional Equipment

We invest in well-maintained, commercial-grade equipment ‚Äî because the right tools produce better results.

Satisfaction Guarantee

If you're not happy with the outcome, we'll return to make it right at no extra charge.

Get your free, no-obligation quote today. We respond within one business day.
